mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardContents})
mapper.select: SELECT id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents, boardHits, createdAt FROM board ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) VALUES (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, boardId, originalFileName, storedFileName FROM board_file_table WHERE boardId = #{id}
